CLAUSE 5: P
Risk Level: medium Word Count: 35
repayment: The Borrower has the right to prepay all or any part of the Loan, together with
accrued and unpaid interest thereon, at any time without prepayment penalty or premium of any
plain_english: This payment requires compliance with specific requirements.
user_impact: You must follow these medium-risk requirements or face consequences.
